thread_name: THE CLIO 2 RESIDENCES @ IOI RESORT CITY, PUTRAJAYA
post_content: Went to its sales booth at IOI city mall. Looks good in design and location. Also love the low density type of projects like this.Being close to the mall (which is still expanding) is a great value. accessibility to other towns also pretty good (minus the traffic). maintenance fee a little bit on the high side i think.Was informed by the SA that the take-up rate also impressive, since launching last month. i'm currently thinking to buy one too.just few questions. SA told me that this is a commercial lot, but transferable to residential for utilities upon receiving the key later. is it true?another thing is, is it under Putrajaya or Selangor address? Based on its brochure, the building plan was approved by Sepang MC. not sure on this.

thread_name: THE CLIO 2 RESIDENCES @ IOI RESORT CITY, PUTRAJAYA
post_content: There are still units at clio 1 available. Any particular reasons why current buyers chose clio2? Im considering clio 1.. clio2 price is cheaper but will need to wait till vp to move in..

thread_name: THE CLIO 2 RESIDENCES @ IOI RESORT CITY, PUTRAJAYA
post_content: 1. Can transfer depends on how fast IOI doing their job.2. IOI resort city under MP Sepang, not putrajaya. Near putrajaya border only.

thread_name: THE CLIO 2 RESIDENCES @ IOI RESORT CITY, PUTRAJAYA
post_content: 1. My SA told me also that they will transfer to residential after vp2. Address postcode will be 62502 putrajaya but local authority will be MP Sepang"Clio 2 Residence, Lebuh IRC, IOI Resort City, 62502 Putrajaya"3. Below picture block A status booking this morning4. Tower B and C either end of the year or next year will be launch
